name: Sniper spot the numbers
description:
The most beautiful number puzzle game for you.
It's easy to play for everyone, however it could also drive genius crazy.
Tap the numbers from the smallest to the largest. Numbers will keep increasing. Beat your friends on the leaderboard. Earn bonus time when you hit a checkpoint and also look out for extra bonus time.

Features:
• Endless challenge
• Easy to play, hard to master
• Simple and colorful design
• Beautiful music and sounds
• Share your color with friends
• Unlimited Color Themes
